name: Sam'sscroll
0:
”Alexa Ask Sam's scroll who is Jon Snow”
”Ask Sam's scroll Who Gilly is”
”Alexa, ask sam's scroll to remind me who tyrion is”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sam's scroll
des:
Let's be honest we can't keep up with all the characters in Game of Thrones universe. We forget who is who most of the time. with Sam's scroll that won't be a problem anymore. Just give Sam's scroll any character name and he will give you a short back story.
I am planning on adding more features soon and he will be your all in one guide to the GOT universe!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
